text: [Ej pajomʙar, ashoʙat] Az tu mepursand, ci ciz ʙarojason halol sudaast. Bigu: "Cizhoi pokiza ʙarojaton halol gastaast va [hamcunin] on ci ʙa kumaki hajvonoti sikori [ʙa dast meovared, caro], ki onhoro ʙo on ci Alloh taolo ʙa sumo omuxtaast, dastomuz mekuned. Pas, az on ci [xud naxurdaand va] ʙaroi sumo giriftaand, ʙixured va [ʙa hangomi zaʙh jo firistodani hajvonoti sikori] nomi Allohro ʙar on ʙiʙared va az Alloh taolo parvo kuned [ʙitarsed]. Be gumon, Alloh taolo dar hisoʙrasi sare' ast
